body_html:
Can you show me your code, please?

Thanks for your reply !
To make things simple, I simply run the yolo3 code from marvis/pytorch-yolo3.
The time running on several images on windows server 2012 R2 is like:

Loading weights from yolov3.weights... Done!
data\dog.jpg: Predicted in 0.218750 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\eagle.jpg: Predicted in 0.203140 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\giraffe.jpg: Predicted in 0.211412 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\horses.jpg: Predicted in 0.218754 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\person.jpg: Predicted in 0.203153 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\predictions.jpg: Predicted in 0.218781 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\scream.jpg: Predicted in 0.198292 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg

However, if i run the same code on ubuntu16.04, it's much faster!
Here is the time usage on ubuntu, almost 4times faster than running on win server.

Loading weights from yolov3.weights... Done!
data/eagle.jpg: Predicted in 0.049110 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/dog.jpg: Predicted in 0.051502 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/predictions.jpg: Predicted in 0.050423 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/horses.jpg: Predicted in 0.050959 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/scream.jpg: Predicted in 0.048784 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/person.jpg: Predicted in 0.050009 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/giraffe.jpg: Predicted in 0.049526 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg

It doesnot make any sense! Those machines are all using NVIDIA 1080ti.
Is it because pytorch cannot do well on windows server?
Can you help me out, please?

body:
> Can you show me your code, please?

Thanks for your reply !
To make things simple, I simply run the yolo3 code from [marvis/pytorch-yolo3](https://github.com/marvis/pytorch-yolo3).
The time running on several images on windows server 2012 R2 is like:
```
Loading weights from yolov3.weights... Done!
data\dog.jpg: Predicted in 0.218750 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\eagle.jpg: Predicted in 0.203140 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\giraffe.jpg: Predicted in 0.211412 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\horses.jpg: Predicted in 0.218754 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\person.jpg: Predicted in 0.203153 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\predictions.jpg: Predicted in 0.218781 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data\scream.jpg: Predicted in 0.198292 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
```

However, if i run the same code on ubuntu16.04, it's much faster!
Here is the time usage on ubuntu,  almost 4times faster than running on win server.
```
Loading weights from yolov3.weights... Done!
data/eagle.jpg: Predicted in 0.049110 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/dog.jpg: Predicted in 0.051502 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/predictions.jpg: Predicted in 0.050423 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/horses.jpg: Predicted in 0.050959 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/scream.jpg: Predicted in 0.048784 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/person.jpg: Predicted in 0.050009 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
data/giraffe.jpg: Predicted in 0.049526 seconds.
save plot results to predictions.jpg
```

It doesnot make any sense! Those machines are all using NVIDIA 1080ti.
Is it because pytorch cannot do well on windows server?
Can you help me out, please?
